title: Shearer's mince and potato hot pot
ingredients: ['1kg potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '500g mince', '1 onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', 'salt and pepper to taste', '50g butter', '4 tablespoons plain flour', '475ml milk', '125g grated Cheddar cheese', '175g tinned mushrooms, drained', '50g butter']
